channel.title: Speak English, and state your question!
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape,
I am tired of seeing threads like this http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294319.0.html Aren't you? It messy, retarded and hard to understand, Am I right? If you are going to ask a question, speak proper English. The h3lp f3w th1ngs bullshit is just stupid. Really state our question. Like instead "how i get custom items" it could be more like "How would I go about programming my own custom or modified items?" See how it is easier to read and understand. When you go to ask a question it should be a question not "i need someone do this for me" you question should be more like "How would I program this?" See that is also easier to understand. Also for people answering questions, only answer if you know what you are doing. If you're about as confused as the other person, Don't bother trying to fix it, also don't be like "ur a fag cuz ou can't do dis and i can". If you are going to answer the questions, answer it.
Thanks, Anthony

item.title: Speak English, and state your question!
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

[quote=“x0 0wn, post:4, topic:224253”]Trust me, I’ve been here nearly 2 years. I know what it’s like.
It’s always been the same.[/quote]

I’ve been in runescape cheating for 3 years, it started out amazing programmers (with the exception of a few).

Read full topic

item.title: Speak English, and state your question!
item.dc:creator: @Moo_Dragon Moo Dragon
item.description:
@Moo_Dragon wrote:

im zo zeer zeer droevig spreek ik het Engels maar uhh geen behoefte niet om dit hier te posten

  • translation:
    im so very very sorry i dont speak english but uhh no need to post this here [translated by www.google.com]

geen sprak ik niet in het Engels dan dat een vertaling door google is

-translation:
no i didnt talk in english than that is a translation by google [translated by www.google.com]

Read full topic

item.title: Speak English, and state your question!
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

I don’t see this working but I hope it does, I totally agree with you about ‘General Moparscapers’ who want help as fast as they can so they start double posting. I’ve seen so many people use the thread title ‘help!!!’ It’s so annoying because they could at least give a bit of info on what they need before you open the thread to find something stupid like ‘shops dnt open n i haf lyk 100 errors wtf do i do’

Annoying. Lol

Read full topic
